To pay attention; to keep in mind. -- tøryky. To conceive an idea. aγuu -- tai. Broad-minded axur -- . Lack of foresight, shortsightedness. caγan -- Clean mind, good mind γoul -- Main idea, principal idea jeke -- tai. Haughty, supercilious, overambitious, having great ambition. maγu -- tai. Evil-minded, ill-willed; suspicious nigen -- ber. Being of one mind, unanimously xar-a -- . Vicious thoughts ynen --n ijen Truly, sincerely, earnestly -- aldaxu. To sigh, moan. -- amur. Having peace of mind; carefree; careless -- amurxu. To be relieved, acquire peace of mind -- ber ijen. At random, as one desires, arbitrarily -- bucaxu. To change one's mind. -- -- ebdereky. To break up (as friendship, cordial relations) --n u dur-a ber Arbitrarily, highhandedly --n u ebedcin. Heartache, heartbreak -- sedkil. Frame of mind, disposition; mind and thought -- sedkil amur ygei. Depressed, worried. -- sedkil aldaxu. To be out of one's mind from grief or disappointment; to be frustrated -- zobaxu. To worry about; to grieve ene jambar -- tai kymyn bei! What is his idea? What is he thinking? ( expressing surprise and disgust). øcyken -- My humble opinion (wish ); small mind sain -- tai. Kind-hearted; well-meaning. sedkil -- . Frame of mind, disposition; thought and mind ujaraxu -- . Languishment, sadness. -- ber bolxu. To be in agreement with one's desire or intention -- ber busu/bisi. Against one's wish, unintentionaly -- edyky, To start or initiate an idea or a plan. -- oruγulxu. To Suggest an idea or plan; To put an idea into someone's head sanaγ-a bodulγ-a Intention, policy

S1650 Se* t - Sera - Serea сар
SAR-A, SARA(N) (There is a tendency to write sara for the moon and sar-a for the month). n. a) Moon. b) Month. Lunar months are designated by the cardinal numbers so that xojar sar-a is February, γurban sar-a is March, etc. January, however, is caγan sar-a or in formal style terigyn sar-a. The solar months are designated by the ordinal numbers, so that January is nigedyger sar-a, etc. -- barixu. Eclipse of the moon. -- γarxu. The moon rises. -- gkirteky . To be eclipsed (of the moon). --n syke. Moon-shaped hatchet. --n [u] gerel Moonlight --n u xaγucin. Waning of the moon. -- sinedky. The moon waxes. -- tøgyrig. The moon is full. keltegei -- . Crescent. saraγul -- . Clear, shining moon. sin-e -- . New moon. tergel -- . Full moon. xaγucin -- . Waning moon. -- jin belge. Menstruation, menses. -- jin jaγum-a. Menstruation, menses. -- jin sined. First half of the lunar month. -- jin xaγucid. Last half of the lunar month. angxan -- . First month or new moon. baγa -- . Twenty-nine-day month in the lunar calendar. caγan -- . The first month of the year, new year. γaxai -- . Tenth month of the astrological calendar. γurbaduγar -- . The third month, March. γurban -- . March; three months. ilegyy -- . Intercalary month. jeke -- . A thirty-day month in the lunar calendar tabun -- . The fifth month, May tegys -- . Complete month (i.e. month of thirty days, acc. to the old calendar). terigyn -- . First month of each season; January ( formal style). xaruciraγsan -- . Last month. xoitu -- . Next month.

Thought, idea, intention; feeling, opinion; spirit; soul, psyche, intellect, mind, heart; conscience. -- bajasxu To be happy, glad -- bulijamar Ravishing, charming -- cilen = sedkilcilen As one wishes or desires; according to one's thoughts, hopes or expectation; as expected. -- dyr zokistai Pleasant, agreeable -- i bulijaγci. Captivating, charming. -- ijen gyicedkeky. To show one's appreciation; to express one's true feelings; to fulfill one's moral obligation. -- i sinzileky uxaγan. Psychology. -- sain. Of good character; of a good mind. -- tegylder. Perfection of mind tybsin . Unperturbed; possessing a mind, soul, etc.; peaceful and tranquil; of righteous mind, fair minded -- ygei. Inanimate, soulless, thoughtless -- yn. Heartfelt, cordial; spiritual. -- yn bajar. Cordial, heartfelt greetings. -- yn ebedcin. Worry; heart ailment -- yn inaγ Sweetheart; bosom friend -- yn yzel. Idealism. -- ziryke. Heart, mind -- zøgelereky To pity, soften, relent. nigen -- ijer. Unanimously, with one mind. sain -- . Good intention, good mind, kind heart. sain -- ece . With the best intentions xar-a -- . Evil mind, wicked thought, suspicion ynen -- ece From the bottom of one's heart
